channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Dai yn ceisio tyfu coeden oren o hadau. Yn y g?m b?l-droed, a all oren Dai helpu i ennill y g?m? Dai is trying to grow an orange tree from seeds but without much luck.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymylaubychain

channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: mae o'n hoff o gadw llwyau hufen ia plastig er fod Draff yn credu taw sbwriel y' nhw. Pablo likes plastic icecream spoons even more than icecream.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Pan mae Odo a Dwdl yn torri hoff fwg Penbandit ar ddamwain, maen nhw'n trial gwneud un newydd allan o glai. Odo and Doodle accidentally break Camp Leader's favourite mug.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Mor Ladron ifanc o Ysgol Tan y Lan sy'n wynebu heriau Capten Cnec yr wythnos hon. The young pirates from Ysgol Tan y Lan face Capten Cnec's challenges this week.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caban Banana Gareth
channel.desc: Mae Gareth yr Orangutan yn teithio ysgolion Cymru yn trafod amryw bynciau. Tro hwn, Ffermio ydi'r pwnc trafod. This week, Farming is the topic of discussion between Gareth and the schools.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Wrth i grwbanod m?r newydd-anedig anelu am y cefnfor, mae'n rhaid i'r Octonots eu hamddiffyn rhag ysglyfaethwyr. As newborn baby sea turtles scuttle to the ocean they need help to stay safe.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Gwyneth wedi derbyn gwahoddiad i ddangos wyau y fferm ar raglen Prynhawn Da ond ma Anni a Cerys yn torri pob wy! Gwyneth has accepted an invitation to exhibit the farm's special eggs.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patrol Pawennau
channel.desc: Mae Dyfri eisiau ymarfer chwarae'r g?m 'Madfall Wedi Fflio' cyn y carnifal. Dyfri wants to practice playing the 'Flying Newts' game before the carnival.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Parc Glan Gwil
channel.desc: Mae hi'n benblwydd ar Sioned Siop a sdim bwriad dathlu ganddi, ond ma Dion Diogelwch yn trefnu parti syrpreis iddi! Sioned has no intention of celebrating her birthday but others have plans.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Carlo Bach
channel.desc: Cyn mynd i'w wely, mae Carlo eisiau hedfan yn ei awyren. Mae o'n cael cymaint o hwyl fel ei fod bron ag anghofio anfon anrheg pen-blwydd Pwtyn! Carlo almost forgets to send Pwtyn a present.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Joni Jet
channel.desc: Pan aiff Jet-fam i hedfan efo Jetboi, ceisia Joni wneud popeth y ffordd 'iawn', gan amau ei fod ar brawf. When Jet-mom goes to fly with Jet-boy, Joni tries to do it all the 'right' way.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
channel.desc: Mae Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn wedi colli eu p?l tenis ac felly'n methu parhau ?'u g?m. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn have lost their tennis ball and so they can't continue their game. Can Jim help.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Glenys yn dod o hyd i fap sy'n dangos lle mae'r cnau yn yr helfa gnau yn cael eu cuddio ac mae'n ymuno yn y g?m. Glenys finds a map showing where the nuts for the Nut Hunt are hidden.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Gwiber yn perswadio Crawc i ddefnyddio ei mwd adfywiol er mwyn cael ei lun ar glawr blaen cylchgrawn Arwyr Glan yr Afon. Gwiber convinces Crawc that her mud has a healing quality.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Mae Guto eisiau gwybod o ble ddaw lafant, felly mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd ag ef i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn. Guto wants to know where lavender comes from.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Timpo

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cymylaubychain
channel.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn brysur tu hwnt heddiw; mae bron pawb eisiau cot o baent ond does ganddi ddim amser i baentio pawb. Who can help Baba Melyn give everyone a coat of paint today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pablo
channel.desc: Mae Pablo wrth ei fodd yn teimlo'r awel pan mae o ar y siglen, ond beth am yr anifeiliaid? Pablo loves feeling the breeze as he swings on the swing, but what about the animals.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Odo
channel.desc: Mae cant a mil o wiwerod yng Ngwersyll Maes y Mes ac maen nhw'n rhedeg yn wyllt. Yr unig beth gallan nhw ddweud yw "sori a diolch". The camp is overrun by over-enthusiastic squirrels today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dod ar draws llyffaint dart gwenwynig ar ?l i eger llanw peryglus daro'r Amason. The Octonauts find out about poison dart frogs after a tidal bore sweeps up the Amazon.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae tad Anni yn gofyn i Anni a Cai i lanhau wedi'r storm fawr ac ma'r ddau'n troi tasg diflas i un llawn hwyl! Anni's father asks Anni and Cai to help with the cleanup after the great storm.

channel.desc: Mae'r teulu wedi mynd i wersylla, ac mae Deian a Loli'n edrych ymlaen at fwyta malws melys, ond tydi Loli ddim yn rhannu'n deg! Deian and Loli are camping and excited to eat marshmallows.

channel.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Abadas
channel.desc: Mae gan Ben air anarferol i'r Abadas heddiw ac maen nhw'n dysgu bod ganddo gysylltiad ? dwr. A fun-filled adventure as the Abadas search for a new word which has some connection with water.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Rhaid i Guto. Lili a Benja achub eu frind Jac Sharp, mae'n ras i roi Jac n?l yn y llyn. Guto,Lili and Benja must rescue Jac sharp and it's a race to return him to the lake.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Awyr Iach
channel.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SeliGo
channel.desc: Cyfres slapstic am griw bach glas doniol. Y tro hwn, mae'r criw'n chwarae o gwmpas gyda maint arian! Series about a group of funny blue men. This time they play about with the size of money.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Oi! Osgar
channel.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
channel.desc: Mae Mwmintrol wedi'i swyno pan ddaw o hyd i ddraig go iawn, sydd y maint cywir i fod yn anifail anwes. Moomintrol is fascinated when he finds a real dragon, just the right size to be a pet.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Criw'r Cwt
channel.desc: Mae Bertha yn galw'r Criw Cwt pan mae Prince yn cymryd ei lle ar ei hoff soffa - o na! Bertha calls the Coop Troop when Prince takes her place on her favourite sofa - uh-oh.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Prys a'r Pryfed
channel.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Prys a'r Pryfed heddiw? What's happening in Prys a'r Pryfed's world today.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bois y Pizza
channel.desc: Cyfle arall i ddilyn y bois ar eu ffordd i gystadleuaeth pizza fwya'r byd yn Yr Eidal. Another chance to follow two Welshmen through Europe as they aim for the World Pizza Championships.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sgorio
channel.desc: Y Seintiau Newydd v Pen-y-bont a'r gorau o'r frwydr rhwng Wrecsam a Chaerdydd ym Mhrif Adran Genero. All the action and excitement of the Welsh football pyramid.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Mae Mark yn gyffrous am y bosibilrwydd o berchen ar fwclis gwerthfawr. Mae Anita'n dod wyneb yn wyneb gyda'i dyfodol ym Mrynawelon. Lleucu hopes Cai's homecoming will be smooth sailing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae'r K's yn wallgo eto gan fod Kelvin yn ymddangos fel ei fod yn esgeuluso ei gyfrifoldebau fel tad. Things are quite rocky between Rhys, Trystan and Sian following Trystan's revelation.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Weithred
channel.desc: Drama yn seiliedig ar hanes tri Chymro a ymdrechodd i rwystro cynlluniau Corfforaeth Lerpwl i foddi Tryweryn. Drama based on the story of the men who strived to save Tryweryn Valley.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yr Actor A'r Eicon
channel.desc: Yr actor Kimberley Abodunrin sy'n dysgu mwy am Betty Campbell, prifathrawes ddu gyntaf Cymru. Actor Kimberley Abodunrin learns more about Wales' first black Welsh headteacher Betty Campbell.
